name: Formidable Patchouli
description:
If the game window is too large, or if the game is lagging on the web player, please download and play the Windows build instead.

Based off a previous visual novel, Formidable Alice, this one is made for Touhou Pride Game Jam 2 (https://itch.io/jam/touhou-pride-jam-2). Instead of Marisa x Alice, it's Marisa x Patchouli.

No, this is NOT a sequel.

kurantoB - lead, programming, writing
Bakaretsu - programming
VItheSixth - writing
Utsuho - music arrangement
Celia - character art, scenery
